Class ExtendedMath

java.lang.Object
  es.ull.iis.util.ExtendedMath

public class ExtendedMath
extends java.lang.Object

A simple class which provides classes to perform some mathematical operations.

Author:
Iván Castilla Rodríguez

power

public static double power(double x,
                           int n)
Raise a double to a positive integer power. Fast version of Math.pow.

Parameters:
x - number to be taken to a power.
n - power to take x to. 0 <= n <= Integer.MAX_VALUE Negative numbers will be treated as unsigned positives.
Returns:
x to the power n
